member.name: T:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents
member.summary: Defines logging events for various application scenarios.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogNullCryptocurrency
member.summary: Event indicating an attempt to add a null cryptocurrency.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogCryptocurrencyNotFound
member.summary: Event indicating a cryptocurrency with a specific ID was not found.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogCryptocurrencyAdded
member.summary: Event indicating a new cryptocurrency was added.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogCryptocurrencyUpdated
member.summary: Event indicating a cryptocurrency was updated.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogCryptocurrencyDeleted
member.summary: Event indicating a cryptocurrency was deleted.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogGetAllCryptocurrenciesStarted
member.summary: Event indicating the start of the process to retrieve all cryptocurrencies.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogGetAllCryptocurrenciesCompleted
member.summary: Event indicating the successful completion of the process to retrieve all cryptocurrencies.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogNoCryptocurrenciesFound
member.summary: Event indicating that no cryptocurrencies were found.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogNullUser
member.summary: Event indicating an attempt to add a null user.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogUserNotFound
member.summary: Event indicating a user with a specific ID was not found.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogUserAdded
member.summary: Event indicating a new user was added.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogUserUpdated
member.summary: Event indicating a user was updated.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogUserDeleted
member.summary: Event indicating a user was deleted.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogNullTransactionHistory
member.summary: Event indicating an attempt to add a null transaction history.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogTransactionHistoryNotFound
member.summary: Event indicating a transaction history with a specific ID was not found.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogTransactionHistoryAdded
member.summary: Event indicating a new transaction history was added.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogTransactionHistoryUpdated
member.summary: Event indicating a transaction history was updated.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogTransactionHistoryDeleted
member.summary: Event indicating a transaction history was deleted.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogDatabaseError
member.summary: Event indicating an error occurred while accessing the database.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogExternalApiError
member.summary: Event indicating an error occurred while accessing an external API.

member.name: F:CryptoSpect.Utility.Logging.LogEvents.LogUnexpectedError
member.summary: Event indicating an unexpected error occurred.
